required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Endostar Subcutaneous Injection in NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Open-label Study to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Endostar Subcutaneous Injection in Chinese Advanced NSCLC Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, single-arm study to assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of Endostar subcutaneous injection in Chinese advanced NSCLC patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: until 30 days after the last dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: day1, day2 of cycle1;day1,day2,day4,day13,day14,day15,day16,day17 of cycle2; day2,day13,day14,day15 of cycle3; up to 9 weeks

intervention.description: Endostar, ih, QD，day 1 of cycle 1; Endostar, ih, QD，day 2-15 of cycle 3;
